Content:: Araripemys is an extinct marine[1] turtle genus from 112 to 109 million years ago, in the Early Cretaceous Crato and Romualdo Formations of the Araripe Basin in northeastern Brazil. It is one of the oldest known pleurodires.[2] This article about a prehistoric turtle is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
